verses.name: Genesis 26:30
verses.text: And he made them a feast, and they did eat and drink.

verses.name: Genesis 26:31
verses.text: And they rose up betimes in the morning, and sware one to another: and Isaac sent them away, and they departed from him in peace.

verses.name: Genesis 26:32
verses.text: And it came to pass the same day, that Isaac’s servants came, and told him concerning the well which they had digged, and said unto him, We have found water.

verses.name: Genesis 26:33
verses.text: And he called it Shebah: therefore the name of the city is Beer–sheba unto this day.
